com.eteks.sweethome3d.viewcontroller

Interface View

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DialogView, HelpView, HomeView, ImportedFurnitureWizardStepsView, PlanView, TextureChoiceView, ThreadedTaskView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundImageWizardStepsPanel, BaseboardChoiceComponent, CompassPanel, FurnitureCatalogListPanel, FurnitureCatalogTree, FurnitureTable, HelpPane, Home3DAttributesPanel, HomeComponent3D, HomeFramePane, HomeFurniturePanel, HomePane, ImportedFurnitureWizardStepsPanel, ImportedTextureWizardStepsPanel, LabelPanel, LevelPanel, ModelMaterialsComponent, MultipleLevelsPlanPanel, ObserverCameraPanel, PageSetupPanel, PhotoPanel, PhotosPanel, PlanComponent, PlanComponent.PlanRulerComponent, PolylinePanel, PrintPreviewPanel, RoomPanel, TextureChoiceComponent, ThreadedTaskPanel, UserPreferencesPanel, VideoPanel, WallPanel, WizardPane

    public interface View
    An MVC view created and controlled by a controller.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret
